amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-395 to encourage the Secretary of Interior and Secretary of Agriculture to ensure servicemember and veteran access to public lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-395 to encourage the Secretary of Interior and Secretary of Agriculture to ensure servicemember and veteran access to public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
